name: Maglaxians
description: Maglaxians is a platform game inspired by Manic Miner. Player's task is to beat all 128 levels. He has to pick all items in every level and then go to another level. He must manage this in time and has to avoid enemies that threaten him. Player will come across multiple platforms and riding belts that help him reach his goal. In last level, player finds a rocket that takes him to his home planet.
